title: UPI Service providers sought regulatory intervention to make transactions remunerative
description: The UPI payment ecosystem is currently under the sway of two major players â€“ Google Pay, commanding a substantial 47% market share, and PhonePe, a Walmart subsidiary, holding a significant 37% share. This duopoly underscores the competitive landscape and the uphill battle faced by smaller players.
